import { useRef } from 'react' import '../css/Classroom.css' import { openClassroom } from '../service/classroom_access_service' import { buildClassSetting } from '../service/class_setting_service' function ClassForm(props) { const classroomWs = props.classroomWs const classroomNameRef = useRef(null) const classroomDescRef = useRef(null) const classroomTimeRef = useRef(null) const startClassHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const classSetting = buildClassSetting(classroomNameRef.current.value, classroomDescRef.current.value, classroomTimeRef.current.value) openClassroom(classroomWs, classSetting) } return (

開啟教室：

教室名稱：

教室簡介：




<>
) } export default ClassForm
